name: Michael Rayburn
text:
Mellow Mushroom 8/14/2020

Tonight I had a rather poor experience at your location in Alpharetta, GA. I …More

name: VP
text: Food and service was great. Restaurant could have been more clean.

name: Ji Han
text: No social distancing.  The person at the front wears their mask under their nose, and worse, takes it off the talk on the phone right by the front door. I mean if you aren’t going to do it just say your not doing it. Pick a lane, just don’t pretend.

name: Alyssa Prior
text: Overall bad experience. Service was poor and slow. Ordered the pretzel bites which weren't even made of pretzel but rather pizza dough and were so badly burnt I actually cracked a tooth biting into one. …More

name: Aaron Lutz
text: Really awesome place! Really liked their chicken and cheese. I usually go for the pizza but got a sandwich was great! I disliked where the restroom was located though! I like the atmosphere but seemed smaller than usual.

name: Kyle Fee
text: One of my favorite pizzerias is Mellow Mushroom, but unfortunately I cannot say the same about the staff and service I have experienced my past few times ordering online pickup from this location.  Since the COVID pandemic and switching to …More

name: Al Fernandez
text: I eat lunch at a mellow mushroom just about every week and it’s always great service and great food. However this location is so slow that I need to let everyone know to stay away. I had to wait 10 minutes just to get my drink and the sandwich took over 30 minutes for me to get.

name: Matt Bunce
text: My least favorite MM on the north side of Atlanta. Pizza is fine, workers consistently grumpy.

name: phillip washington
text: Awesome place!! I love eating here

name: James Bloor
text:
Inconsistent at times, which is unfortunate.
Really you soon joy the specialty pizzas but feel like they have dropped off a bit.

name: Megan Woods
text:
Amazing service. great food. Awesome owners!
Win all across the board.

name: Kristina Blair
text: The service was good but we did not like the pizza. We went here bc I heard a few good comments but we won't go back. Not our kind of pizza.

name: Frank Ambrusko
text: Great service, food, and music!  Will definitely be back to this location.  I love the Maui Wowie Pizza!  Delish!

name: D Ford
text: This location has very slow service. One other customer in the shop. Waited 39 minutes for half a sandwich.  The server could have less if I was there. She didn't even ask if I wanted a refill on my beer.I expected more from from a big chain. I will never return to this location.

name: Spiv Station
text: Always great food, but always takes AWHILE. Even if it's pretty much just us there.

name: Matthew
text: Great pizza and sandwiches. I am not usually a fan of chain restaurants but I make an exception for the mellow.

name: Maribeth Colovos
text: Pizza was delicious, service was awful. As we watched people around us (who ordered after us )get their pizza, someone finally asked what we were waiting for. We told them our order and with an attitude (like it was our fault) the server …More

name: Cliff Lee
text: By far one of the best experiences I've had at a pizza joint. Good people making good food!

name: Dirk Mitchell
text: Amazing food, the pizza was even better the next day. We got the Cosmic Karma and the Pacific Rim and both were very good. The ingredients seemed super fresh and the dough is different than most I have had. It seems to be a wheat or …More

name: John Martinez
text: Love this place. Great pizza, nice staff. Small, but cozy, not cramped. Outdoor (covered) seating available.

name: Beaingram Beaingram
text: Love the Alphatetta MellowMushroom. Such a great local pizza and bar

name: Sarah Finley
text: I love every Mellow Mushroom I've ever eaten at. I started eating at the first one in Sandy Springs,Ga. back in the 70's. It is and has always been more expensive than other pizza places, but the food is well worth the price.

name: Kristen M
text: Great food, great owners, and happy to have them in the neighborhood!!

name: Leah Ashe
text: The BEST pizza anywhere!

name: Jubran Mokheiche
text: I enjoyed my time there. Sat down to snag a quick bite of wings while I waited for my pizza. The wings were surprisingly good most definitely will get them again. Pizza was decent for a mellow nothing mind blowing but still prefer it to 90% of the major chains. Overall 7 1/2 out of 10

name: Jim Gebhardt
text: Great pizza as usual from mellow mushroom. This location used to have a reputation for being on the slow side, but last two or three visits here for me have been quick (for a sit down restaurant) Pleasant servers too.

name: michael landers
text: It was great.  Food was excellent.

name: Allison Lawson
text: Pretzel bites we're awesome and Greek salad was wonderful!!!! Great service!😊

name: Sara Arevalo
text: Not a good experience at this location, and I love Mellow Mushroom but every location is different. I found chicken in my tofu salad, lunch took over an hour to get in and out due to them seemingly being understaffed, and service did not come with a smile. There are others nearby, so we will go to another location.

name: Baby G
text: They often run out of ingredients and menu items. Service can be slow. Otherwise Ok.

name: Marguerite Robins
text: Food is always the way you order. Always quick and staff very attentive. Bumblebee keeps kids engaged.

name: Alfred Morris Jr.
text: I love this place. Great pizza and awesome  staff.

name: Prashant Basawa
text: Enjoyed pizza here. It was very tasty. Toppings were expensive though. Sitting area is not that great.

name: Anthony Cashin
text: I particularly like this Mellow Mushroom because it's small and cozy. They do a great job and you get more of a personal treatment vibe than a typical MM.

name: Queen Aries
text: Greek salad rules,love their pizza

name: Angie Rigney
text: Same great food as always. This looks to be one of the smaller locations, but they make up for that with a nice big patio. Limited beer selection compared with some other locations. Terrific staff!

name: Secret 101
text: So we decided to dine at this location. Big mistake!!! While we were seated we could clearly see into the kitchen and witness the guy making our pizzas without gloves! Strike 1!! That's not all...as this was happening another guy who came …More

name: Chitra Madabushi
text: Really good pizza.

name: L'Bonne Walker
text: Their potato pizza is so good

name: Brad Morrison
text: Not a good experience. The quality is not on par with other Mellow Mushrooms. Greek salad dressing tasted rancid, daughter's pizza came without sauce so it was essentially cheese bread. The only positive was that our waitress was pleasant. We won't be back.

name: David Stiles
text: Service was bad food was slow

name: Robert Thomas
text:
Nasty!!!
When your kids don't want the pizza or take any of the leftover home. You know the food is nasty... Not to mention we were forgotten about...  Food took way to long to get to the table...  But the waiter was nice.

name: Sophie Coty
text: Food is great, as always. Relaxed environment

name: Apollo Jones
text: Lol why would i ever go back.

name: Randy Blasch
text: Good food at good prices

name: Mmmagikarp
text: Great food, great service. Had to kill a few gnats before we ate though 😬

name: Edith Butler
text: Great pizza and they have Gluten Free pizza and it is really good.

name: christopher stiakakis
text: They were busy and did not handle it well.

name: Olcay Sarmaz
text: Horrible experience. The wait was extremely long. When they finally got us a table, nobody took care of us for another half an hour. It took an hour and 45 minutes until we get our food. I honestly like Mellow Mushroom pizzas but we will never visit this Mellow mushroom again.

name: Marie Prophete
text: Yummy food. Nice people!

name: Classic Stew
text: Very good food and customer service

name: LarryB. Jr.
text: The food sucked. We ordered the house. And I can tell you this was the worst tasting MM pizza I’ve ever tasted. Definitely won’t return.

name: JP McConnell
text: MM has some great pizza. The staff here is pretty laid back and friendly. They can be a little on the slow side, but that typically isn't a concern for me when I'm there. The coveted patio area has a bit of a funky smell though.

name: Blues Baby
text: Best Pizza in Alpharetta by far. My family loves it. They are usually pretty busy, the music and vibe is very chill. I love the garlic parmesan crust on the regular pizza. …More

name: Ash
text: This place has a fun vibe and good drinks and pizza to go with it. Perfect for lunch or dinner.

name: David Van Dyk
text: I love Mellow Mushroom in whatever city! Atlanta was awesome!

name: Gillian Wang
text: Good service and good work on preparation of your food.

name: Quentin Wallace
text: Food was good and service was wonderful. Very friendly staff and pizzas were delivered straight out of the oven.

name: Jack Turner
text: Great pizza, wonderful people

name: Stephanie Kelly
text:
Very consistent with what you expect from the Mellow Mushroom brand.

The service is always excellent - but it is also very popular, so in-restaurant …More

name: Shamus Jones
text: Great management!!! Food is perfect every time! Love the atmosphere. Great staff.

name: Dellene McCleary
text: Food is good. Staff friendly

name: randall crabtree
text: what did I just experience.

name: David Wright
text: Great food and great waiter.

name: Nicki Matuck
text: Had both excellent service and pizza! The white pizza was delicious but it was light, not very filling. The mighty meaty pizza also delicious, more filling! Great atmosphere.

name: kim umling
text: Food was good. Service was ok.

name: Eric Reynolds
text: good food good prices

name: Chris McEnerney
text: Good food, slow service. It also could use an update, or at least a few coats of paint.

name: Aaron Brown
text: Too slow for a business lunch

name: Mariah Lindsey
text: Kosmic Karma with sundried tomatoes, the best...

name: Edde DeLozier
text: Rude waitress...inconsiderate...curt...she wasn't worth the tip she got ....would have smacked her if it was legal...food was tasty....will go to the Roswell GA store next time

name: David Powell
text: Server cut us off while ordering, tried to debate reusable straws with me, got my order wrong, then tried to prove she got it right.

name: Mike Skibba
text: About as good as a pizza can get. Great service too.

name: Matthew Paquette
text: Good pizza and beer, for the area!.

name: Jill Bernard
text: Always great pizza and salad

name: Debra Swain
text: The folks here make you feel like your part of the neighborhood while enjoying  a variety of good food! Great customer service!

name: Robert Cavagnaro
text: Great pizza! I became a fan of the Mellow Mushroom after I read a heart warming story online about how the company responded to a request by a soldier serving in Iraq to do something special for his wife on Valentines Day. As I recall, the …More

name: John Herndon
text: So, the pizza here is really good but the service is not. We live nearby so my wife and I get pick-up from here regularly. Every time we call an order we get off the phone laughing about how "no one we talk to at Mellow Mushroom sounds like …More

name: Ethel Stewart
text: I enjoyed the food.

name: Rick OLeary
text: I LOVE the Shroom. It's just down the street from Roswell Infiniti where I work and I have never waited long for my food. Service is awesome and the food is spectacular. My favorite is the Enchanted Spinach Salado.

name: Dale Ingram
text: Terribly run.

name: Shane Caldwell
text: Unorganized chaos, multiple people here to pick up go orders of which none are done and “it’s going to be another 10-15 minutes”. I ordered it over an hour ago.  Here I thought my pizzas were going to be cold, nope an hour later they’re not …More

name: Tawn Edwards
text: Really nice staff, great food. Really enjoy it every time.

name: nathan brown
text:
I have many friends that live in this area & we've been here several times to dine in.
I've been to many mellow mushrooms around town, and while the architeture and …More

name: Digs Daner
text: We got the Cosmic Karma and it was delicious. Our waiter was a cool guy and service was pretty good. Get the groupon ($25 for $15) and save money!

name: Wendy Tville
text: Pizza was under cooked not very good compared to other MM.

name: fromitsdarkpathintolight
text: One of Best places ever!!! Just Amazing Pizza!!!

name: Chris Lyles
text: Great Mellow mushroom. Owner/manager is usually walking around talking to customers.

name: Timothy Place
text: The burger was probably the best I have ever had...always good pizza

name: Alice Maple
text: My favorite pizza in Atlanta area. This is,quality pizza...crust is spectacular and sauce/cheese are perfectly balanced.

name: Chris and Michelle Edwards
text: Sam and Patrick gave us great service!  Will stop back if in town.

name: Joshua Blanchard
text: Eaten at Mellow Mushrooms all over Georgia, the quality seems to be a bit lacking compared to other locations.

name: Jeff Reeder
text: Great food and service!  Always clean and good environment.  Nice patio.

name: Peco Wainwright
text: I Love this Place! The staff is great and the food is awesome.

name: Thomas Z
text: WORST customer service I have ever expereinced.  A lot of other reviews on yelp will tell you the same thing... …More

name: Taneal Bhandari
text: Friendly staff. Excellent food. Nice covered patio.

name: Richard Schmidt
text: Service was bad but it's not the person fault he was only one there for the whole restaurant. Also the sign is normal words making it difficult to find. Food was great as always just service was slow

name: Ryan Thompson
text: Good, not great food. Good value, better than other chains

name: John Bennett
text: Great people great prices great food

name: Katie Van Winkle
text: Great date night!

name: Joe Terpstra
text: Pizza was really good.  Used a Groupon for $25.  My order had to be at or above the $25 to use the Groupon.

name: Carlos Saldana
text: Smaller of the mellow mushrooms I have been to but the food is the same.

name: Grant Inscoe
text: It feels like this place has lost its mojo.

name: taseti knok
text: It took very close to an hour for a small cheese pizza

name: Everardo Luna
text: awesome calzones, pizza is fresh and hand tossed.

name: Robert Morris
text: Consistently great food and great service at this location

name: Jonah Aberle
text: Been going here all my life. Always incredible pizza.

name: Marque Williams
text: Great place, Food is amazing!

name: Ryan Franck
text: Good food

name: AHov
text: I've never been to a Mellow I didn't like.

name: Jean McCracken
text: Awesome calzone

name: Matthew Newton
text: Great mushrooms!

name: F Troglauer
text: Prices are a bit high

name: Buruj Zyrufa
text: Awesome pizza

name: Michael Abernathy
text: Awesome pizza, love coming here.

name: Caryn Ewald
text: Delicious!

name: Scott Thompson
text: Great, friendly staff!

name: Sonia12 RMBR
text: Awesome pizza

name: Jorge Herrera
text: Nice food

name: Richard Lindsey
text: Great sandwiches

name: Jan Marie Barnard
text: Server was wonderful, food great as always.

name: Brittney Blake
text: Service sucks

name: Kay Bee
text: Great, quirky place!

name: Jabril Mujahid-Alexander
text: VERY GOOD PIZZA

name: Debbie Johnson
text: Great!

name: Lindsey Rodney
text: Not like the other Mellow Mushroom's I've been to. The food was not very good and the service was very slow. There were hardly any toppings on my pizza and the other locations pile them on.

name: Leonardo Pereira
text: (Translated by Google) Very good pizzas. And excellent attention in the restaurant. Thank you. …More
